def_cn: 麦加(沙特阿拉伯城市，伊斯兰教圣城,先知穆罕默德的诞生地，穆斯林祈祷时朝拜的方向)
def_en: Mecca is a city in Saudi Arabia, which is the holiest city in Islam because the Prophet Mohammed was born there. All Muslims face towards Mecca when they pray.

def_cn: 众人向往的地方;圣地;胜地
def_en: If you describe a place as a mecca or Mecca for a particular thing or activity, you mean that many people who are interested in it go there.
